description:
This course is about how you can make money by helping businesses to rank their businesses within You Tube,

This course teaches how to do highly effective You Tube marketing.

No specific materials are required except an understanding of the internet and You Tube.

Everything needed will be taught in the course.

Depending on how quickly the lessons are watched and implemented the course could easily be completed within 2 weeks.

The lectures are mostly in video form.

This course teaches how to build a legitimate business by working with real companies to do their video marketing for them. The business model involves no filming or photographic skills whatsoever.
title: YouTube Marketing - How To Create a Real You Tube Business
